name: Healthy Competition: Product Marketing | Competitive Intelligence | Strategy

recent_episodes.title: April Dunford: Nailing Competitive Positioning
recent_episodes.description:
April Dunford is the world's leading expert on positioning for B2B tech companies and the author of 'Obviously Awesome' as well as the newly released 'Sales Pitch.'


We focused on how competitive intel and positioning intersect in business:

- bashing "approaches," not competitors

- the importance of positioning your competitors

- when to mention competitors (and when to leave them be)

- why you shouldn't be scared of talking about competitors
